Method Detail

b2s

public static java.lang.String b2s(byte[] buf)
Converts byte array into base64 as per rfc2045, except it does not insert any line breaks. http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt

Parameters:
buf - byte array.
Returns:
base64 encoded string

b2s

public static java.lang.String b2s(byte[] buf,
                                   int start,
                                   int len,
                                   boolean linebreaks)
Converts byte array into base64 as per rfc2045, line breaks optional. http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt

Parameters:
buf - byte array
start - position in buf to start at
len - number of bytes to encode
linebreaks - include line breaks after 76 chars
Returns:
base64 encoded string

s2b

public static byte[] s2b(java.lang.String b64)
Convert Base64 String into byte array as per rfc2045. http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt Ignore non-b64 chars (rfc 2045 p26). Consider '=' to be end of string (rfc2045 p25) even if more chars after.

Parameters:
b64 - base64 string
Returns:
byte array

s2is

public static java.io.InputStream s2is(java.lang.String b64)
Returns InputStream from base64 string.

Parameters:
b64 - b64 string
Returns:
ByteArrayInputStream
See Also:
s2b(String)
